DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to find out whether ACE-536 can be safely given to patients. This study will also look to see if ACE-536 increases red blood cells, the cells that carry oxygen in the body.
DOC.brief_title: Study of ACE-536 in Healthy Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Key Postmenopausal women Body Mass Index (BMI) of 20 32 kg/m2. Key History of hypertension Subject has received any erythropoiesis stimulating agents (e.g., Epogen, Procrit, Aranesp, etc.) within 6 months prior to Day 1 History of clinically significant cardiac, endocrine, hematologic, hepatic, immune, metabolic, urologic, pulmonary, neurologic, dermatologic, psychiatric, renal, and/or other disease Surgery within 3 months (other than minor cosmetic surgery or minor dental procedures) Subject has received treatment with another investigational drug, or approved therapy for investigational use within 1 month prior to Day 1, or if the halflife of the previous product is known, within 5 times the halflife prior to Day 1, whichever is longer
